content: ** charts only ** pattern tip if you are a firm/tight crocheter - try using a larger hook for the puff section of this pattern try and keep your puff stitches nice and relaxed so that this part doesn t pull to tightly and ripple we have added extra chains in this area to help counteract tight puffs ❤️ this pattern is dedicated to my wonderful aunty marge every element in this design is inspired by her words can not express how much you are missed now that you are gone you absolutely rocked my world aunty marge <3 i can not thank my testers enough not only did they test this series of patterns but they guided and taught me along the way special thanks to sam bennett for once again being my editor every one of these special ladies helped pull this dedication together for me i am forever grateful thank you for help with the pattern or to share your work please join my group https //www facebook com/groups/crochetwenchdesigns tags #crochetwench #magnificentmarge my facebook page https //www facebook com/thecrochetwench/ my instagram https //www instagram com/wobbs1/ australian crochet community group https //www facebook com/groups/australiancrochetcommunity/
